t: To add sticky notes, you don't need the library. Just point the mouse cursor somewhere and press [n].
When you are done, switch to table #5.
You can also multi-select items in your library - even across tabs - to add them at once.
Now it's time to add your own pieces to the small dungeon below. How about adding an Orc and a treasure chest?
All the items in the library are sorted in Tiles, Overlay, Tokens and Dice tabs. Look for the Orc in the Token tab.
Use the plus icon in the left menu or press the [l] key to open the Library. Select the chest and click 'Add'.
